item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 12 Jan 2021
item.description:
1. Marshal determinism and stability
  2. Sedlex + Menhir parser for both tty and file parsing
  3. First release of awa-ssh
  4. Introducing Feather: A lightweight shell-scripting library for OCaml
  5. postdoc researcher and research engineer positions for CHERI and Arm verification
  6. First ocb (OCaml Badgen) release
  7. Release of OCaml-Git v3.0 and co
  8. Other OCaml News
